# Non-parametric Statistics 

Or, distribution-free Statistics, as we would like to call it. 

Here are some of the R tutorials in markdown format that I have written for this class. This is for class purposes only. 

### Apps for fundamental concepts in probability 

1.  [Empirical CDF converges to true CDF](https://jdatta.shinyapps.io/eCDFdemo/)
2.  [Demoivre-Laplace Central Limit Theorem](https://jdatta.shinyapps.io/demoivre/)

### Beyond basics: Introduction to a few topics in R 

1.  [apply, sapply, lapply and functions in R](http://dattahub.github.io/stat4033/intro_R_pres.html)
2.  [Matrix Example in R, introduction to parallel computing](http://dattahub.github.io/stat5443/matrix_R.html)

### Topics in Nonparametric Statistics 

1.  Quantile transformation, QQplot and Goodness of fit [Examples in R](http://dattahub.github.io/stat4033/rvgen.html)
2.  One way Analysis of Variance (ANOVA): [Examples in R](http://dattahub.github.io/stat4033/anova_examples_doc.html)
3.  ANOVA in R Demo in [ioslides presentation](http://dattahub.github.io/stat4033/aovexamples.html).
4.  Tests for trends and associations [R Examples](http://dattahub.github.io/stat4033/association_demo.html#1)
5.  Bootstrap [R Examples](http://dattahub.github.io/stat4033/bootstrap_demo.html#1)
6.  Chi-square tests [R Examples](http://dattahub.github.io/stat4033/chisqdemo.html#1)
7.  Kernel Density Estimation [R Examples](http://dattahub.github.io/stat4033/kde_demo.html#1)
